name: asmc54xx
summary: TI DSP Assembler for the C54xx family
description: Basic assembler support for the C54xx DSP chip family from TI.
install_details:
Just unpack the archive in your .vim (unix) or vimfiles (windows) directory.
If you want the syntax automaticaly loaded for *.s54 files, add the following in your filetype.vim (in .vim): 
au BufNewFile,BufRead *.s54			setf asmc54xx
